title: Data Science Salon
summary: Meet the Anaconda team in Austin on February 21-22 for the Data Science Salon 2019, which brings together data science practitioners from the Austin finance and technology landscape. We'll be joining experts from Twitter, Dell, Groupon, Adobe, and other leading companies to share best practices and solutions for applying machine learning and AI to real-world problems.

title: Gartner Data & Analytics Summit London
summary: We'll be in London on March 4-6, 2019 for the Gartner Data & Analytics Summit! Come meet the Anaconda team and let us know how you are making predictive analytics part of your daily business strategy.

title: Gartner Data & Analytics Summit Orlando
summary: Meet the Anaconda team in sunny Orlando, FL on March 18-21, 2019 at the Gartner Data & Analytics Summit! We'd love to talk to you about data science best practices and learn how Anaconda can help you make predictive analytics part of your daily business strategy.

title: Strata Data Conference San Francisco
summary: Anaconda will be joining other leading data scientists, analysts, engineers, and executives at the Strata Data Conference in San Francisco on March 25-28. Meet the Anaconda team at booth #1320 and learn how we can provide the tools and technologies your business needs to make your data science and AI strategies successful.

title: AnacondaCON 2019
summary: AnacondaCON 2019 is just around the corner. Now in its third year, AnacondaCON highlights all the different ways people are using machine learning, AI, and predictive analytics to drive their businesses and industries forward. For a glimpse of what to expect, check out our 2018 recap! Stay up-to-date on speakers, events, and ticket pricing through the AnacondaCON website.

title: Strata Data Conference London
summary: Anaconda will head to Strata Data Conference London on April 29 to discuss the latest insights in data science, machine learning, business analytics, visualization, and other innovations. Meet the Anaconda team at booth #408 and learn how we can provide your business with the tools and technologies necessary for successfully executing your AI initiatives.

title: PyCon Cleveland 2019
summary: The Anaconda team is heading to Cleveland on May 1-9 for PyCon 2019, the largest annual gathering for the community using and developing the open-source Python programming language. We look forward to connecting with fellow Pythonistas to discuss the latest best practices and developments, brainstorm projects, and learn what's new in the open source Python world. Come find us at booth #413!

title: Strata Data Conference New York
summary: Join Anaconda at the Strata Data Conference in NYC on September 23-26, 2019 for a close look at the emerging trends and techniques in machine learning, data science, and AI. We'll be at booth #725!

title: SciPy Conferences
summary: The annual SciPy Conference brings together over 900 participants from industry, academia, and government to showcase their latest projects, learn from skilled users and developers, and collaborate on code development.
